content.detailedDescription: Each night i go out on our back deck to run the dog around the back yard before bedtime. on this particular evening, my 13 year old son was outside with me. i always take breaks to let the dog catch her breath and i look up at the sky when it's clear. this was a nice clear night with a semi-bright moon. i then noticed a small star that was slowly moving across the sky. (i say slowly, because it was so darn high in the sky and there was no darting action.)i told my son that it was way too high for any plane to fly and there were no flashing lights. i had him run inside to grab our binoculars, but by the time he came out it had disappeared. there was a low thin cloud that blocked my view for 5-6 seconds, but i could see another star through it. i was straining to keep my eyes on it until i got hold of the binoculars, but it was simply gone from sight. it must have only been 20-30 seconds that i watched it and i thought that maybe it was a satellite or something, but i don't think something like that would move so much. but what do i know, maybe it was a high-flying plane, this is the first time i am posting something like this.
content.summary: We witnessed a star moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were coming down the street behind our house,facing a ball field we seen somthing in the sky,first we thought it was a star the it got closer,and it was lit up,it look like a saucer,hovering,then it dissapeared out of sight.
content.summary: It look like a saucer.

content.detailedDescription: Walking home this evening i saw orange lights in the sky the shape was triangular and the base was curved it was not a solid shape the lights i believe marked the extremities of the object. it moved away making no noise and vanished in seconds i said to ny wife who was with me i wish i had a camera.We moved on a few paces and a second object appeared the same shape and colour and moving toward the spot where the first object had been. the objects seemed to move quite fast and the second one was soon out of sight. we were about ten miles from luton airport and are used to seeing planes overhead, these objects did not look like planes nor did they move like planes. when i first saw the object i thought it could be a plane but it was different enough for me to continue looking, my wife thought it might be a hot air balloon but i said it is moving to fast and i do not think they are allowed to fly at night.
content.summary: Walking home this evening i saw orange lights in the sky the shape was triangular the base of that triangle was curved.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were staying the night at at our grandmothers home, we playing outside when we looked up and saw a bright redish yellow light. it was going fast at about 800mph, soon after we saw two jets heading straight for it speeding quick. but the u.F.O was to fast for them. we watched it until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Bright light with jets following it.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:40 something at night when my band and i just got back to home base in darien, il.  my van was parked backwards in the driveway, and we began to unload our equipment out of the truck. as i took out and set down my amplifier, i looked towards the southwest sky, where i saw right by the moon were five slow moving orange lights, gravitating towards the southern sky. they seemed to be in a delta triangle position. if i were facing south, they would be going from my right to directly in front of me. originally, i had no  idea what to think. definitely not airplanes, but they way they were in position made me think of some type of armada.

i immediately called the rest of the gang, who were all astonished to see the same thing. within about 45 seconds, they left the triangle shape and began dispersing, and one by one they began to disappear, in the southern sky. we followed them for about a minute thirty seconds tops.

almost immediately afterwards we heard loud boom like explosions. we attributed them to the woodridge jubilee festival going on a town over.
content.summary: Five slow moving orange lights in the southwest sky. began with a triangular shape moving south that eventually dispersed as one by one the lights disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were going to a music show at the crystal pistol saloon in downtown tulsa. the show started at 10:00 pm and we arrived in the parking lot across from the street the saloon was located on approximately 9:55 or 9:56. after i got out of the car and was shutting the door, i looked across the road towards the bar and happened to look up at the sky. the local bars there had two light beams shining up into the sky and rotating back and forth (they do this for advertising). because these lights light up the sky, i noticed (as well as my husband after he got out of the car) about 12-15 (maybe even 20) of what looked like stars moving slowly across the sky. in fact, if my eyesight hadn't lingered for a moment, i would have just thought they were stars and walked into the bar and thought nothing of it. however, my eyes did linger on these objects and that is when i relised they were moving slowly in no discernible pattern, that is, some were closer to each other and some looked like outliers. however, they all remained equidistant to each other while travelling. i noticed some were blinking and some weren't. they had the brightness and whiteness of a star, not brighter and not whiter. however, my husband told me after the event that some of them had started glowing red. i myself did not notice this. after several "what the hell is that" exchanges between us, we both just stood transfixed at the sight. then they were gone from the swath of sky they were in; it looked to me as though they entered cloud coverage and disappeared. however, my husband said that to him it looked almost like when they all crossed a certain line in the sky, they disappeared. he didn't feel like they went into cloud coverage, but rather that they shut their lights off or just disappeared. unfortunately, there were no other witnesses to this, as the parking lot was empty and there was so much noise coming from the bars that we couldn't have yelled for people to look up. i have racked my brain trying to mentally discredit what i saw; but, i know that last night actually constituted my first actual alien craft sighting. strangely enough, both my husband and i didn't feel the need to jump into the car and try to chase it or follow it (as i always imagined i would do in this scenario) but rather we felt calm, elated, almost surreal, and we both have commented that we don't feel like this will be our last sighting.
content.summary: Group of approximately 12-15 circle white (some blinking) ufos moving slowly over the tulsa downtown, grouped together but with no discernible pattern, equidistant from each other.

content.detailedDescription:
The 8 june 2010, 2 days after the 6 june 2010 world extraterrestrial contact event, i went back to the same location to try make peacefull contact with extraterrestrials beings.

after the sunset a triangle formation of orb appeared in the sky.
a orange/red orb appeared.  and slowly a strange but magnificient red/orange orb raised above the top of the hill.

some civil aircrafts rushed into the direction of those orbs.

i slowly leaved the location... the red/orange orb slowly rose up in the sky, and others orbs moved into my direction.

i trying to make peacefull contact with those visitors, because i think they really can help us to build a better civilization.... and maybe fix the oil spill in the gulf of mexico....
content.summary: Orbs in triangle formation and orbs red/orange.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an experienced astronomy hobbiest, using a telescope i observed an oval disc, looked metallic in color, definitely not a plane, or commercial airliner.  through telescope my wife and myself could make out an oval shape which changed colors, 

it was very small in the telescope, but had a definite oval shape, moved without sound.

i thought it could have been a satellite, (but these are very hard to see in daylight hours) but the trajectory was not in a linear path, and using starry night software it was confirmed that no satellites were scheduled for the time in question.

not sure what is was, and just wanted to get this reported in case others saw the same thing.  while using the internet i noted a similar object was observed in texas on june 17, 2010.

this is the first time in 30 yrs i have ever seen anything that i couldn't immediately explain.

not as exciting as the bollide i saw a few years ago, but this was definitely more strange.
content.summary: Small disc observed through (daylight) telescope, not a plane s-se.

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry but i want to explain in spanish(im from argentina).

estaba dormida ,eran las 5 am,cuando de repente siento  que al lado de mi cama hay dos personas,muy bajas ,sin pelo,y muy desgadas,en la oscuridad llegue a verlos con dificultad,uno de ellos puso un dedo en mi frente y salio de uno de los dedos ,una aguja muy fina ,la cual penetro mi craneo,en la parte de la frente,me dolio,y no podia llegar a abrir bien los ojos,pero llegaba a verlos,ya q mi habitacion no era tan oscura y se filtraba luz desde afuera,fue rapido,cuando me sacaron la aguja ,ellos se desintregraron en pequenas particulas en la oscuridad,fue rarisimo.
espero puedan traducir esta nota con respecto a mi experiencia,creo q existen y no tengo miedo.
content.summary: 2 people, short , skinny.

content.detailedDescription:
During the week between june 9th and 15th, every time i was in my yard at night i would begin to hear sounds like something big was moving through the thick foliage that surrounds my yard. i live in a remote area and my closest neighbor is 1/4 mile away. with my experience hunting and with animals (i am a reptile breeder) i knew that this entity was not hunting or showing any fear because of the way it moved, it wasn't trying to be stealthy. i have an outside dog and during the early morning hours she would begin barking, but would not leave the porch. 


my son was playing in the backyard when he heard a rustling noise over the embankment at the edge of the yard.  he moved closer to the edge and pulled back the leaves.  he stated that he saw something with white glowing eyes.  he also stated that the object was climbing toward him up the bank.  he says that it was not a deer, elk, bear, or other type of animal, it did have hair.  it did not have a "nose", but it sniffed him. it was tall when it stood up. it stared at him and then backed away, it did not make any noises. my son ran to the other side of the yard and preceded to play, he didn't come to my wife and tell her anything. he was not fearful of the entity.

that night he was sitting with my wife and me and began to tell his story with great excitement. what is strange about that is he will not volunteer any info on his own. he is not a "talker" and will not even tell what happened during the course of his day if you ask him. his story has been consistent each time he has told it. i have tried to confuse him and lead him another way during the conversation, but he always sticks to the same story. my initial thoughs was it was a bear, since they have been moving through the area. i got online and pulled up pictures of different animals and asked him which one he saw and he could not pick any animals from the pics. i used local wildlife pics and exotic (gorillas, orangutans, etc.) and nothing was anything that he saw.
content.summary: Third type encounter with unknown entity.

content.detailedDescription: On this summer night i was returning from our local grocery store in town.  i was in my truck heading towards my property on old airport rd. after i crossed spanish valley rd.,there is a private drive that leads to my front door. by the time i was nearly a quarter mile from my front door, i had to sheild my eyes because there was something so bright in my line of vision i could not see what was ahead of me. at one point i stopped the truck, only momentarily, and looked at the what i will refer to as a "fireball". my first thought was that perhaps work had begun on johnson"s on top. i had heard some talk that a new housing complex would someday be available to those who wanted a breath taking view of spanish valley, from above. i was thinking some workers installed a giant flood light, about (and i am guessing), 30 feet off the ground. my mind was changed very quickly on this theory when this fireball started moving, very slowly, maintaining the same distance from the ground, but moving south, all along the surface of johnsons on top. i knew then i was looking at a ufo. i raced to my front door, beeping the horn, trying to alert my husband who was inside the house. i ran through the front door and screamed for him to come outside and see what i was seeing. he grabbed his very high powered binoculars and raced to the front of our house with me. at the first moment he looked, the fireball was no longer hovering over johnsons on top.It was seemingly nesteled among some stars waaaay up there! it was easy to spot. it was so much brighter than the stars it appeared to be close to. *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)looked trough his binoculars and said,"it is not a star. i see what you mean. it is very bright. i dont know what it is. it is not moving, though"...After 12 minutes, doug was ready to go back inside when the fireball zoomed across the sky and then was very visible over the north end of the moab rim. we watch in sheer amazement as the fireball headed over the city of moab. it was visible hovering and moving over moab, utah, for at least 25 minutes. finally, here is some crazy stuff, before the fireball "disappeared" from our view, we noticed the object now had blinking lights like an airplance. it just disappeaed after it was 10 miles or so away from us.  thank you for this opportunity to share this event with all. i have never seen anything like this before in my life and it feels like i witnessed something from beyond our world.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A blinding bright fireball w/the ability to hover then move very quickly.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying from dallas to san jose and we passed just north of area 51. i had a window seat and could see the runway in the distance.  i happened to look down and say a large black teardrop shape going over the ground. that area is covered with small salt deposits and the object really stood out against the white of the salt deposit.  i could tell that is was very close to the ground.  it was moving very slow (almost like hovering) but was moving toward area 51.  i really believe that it was aurora as it looked like all the artical drawings i have seen.  since i was on a commerical flight i was only able to observe the object for a very short period of time.  i did not have a camera (i do carry one with me at all times now) so i did not get a picture.  all the articals talk about how fast the aurora can go so i was very surprized to see how slow it was traveling.
content.summary: I believe that i saw aurora.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out at my mother-in-law's acreage saturday evening, with my husband and brother-in-law. we were watching a demolished shed being burned.
i like to star gaze, and have been doing so for some time now.  
around 10:15 pm (right after it dark), i happen to look up and seen this star-like object traveling from the southwest at an alarming speed. i pointed it out to my husband and brother-in-law and we watched as it traveled out of sight to the northeast.
content.summary: Star-like.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 4th, 1993 just north of atlanta, a full lunar eclipse was taking place. i was laying on my driveway with a friend watching the event.  it was a clear night with no clouds. we had been outside about an hour so our eyes were well adjusted to the dark.

once the total eclipse was in place, i started seeing the most colorful and awesome shooting stars i have ever seen. red, green, blue, yellow and white shooting stars.  i have watched many major meteor shower events but they didn't even compare to the ones i saw during this lunar eclipse.  and i was just north of a major city so i wasn't expecting to see any as the city lights were all around me. 

while pointing at each shooting star i saw, about 5 to 20 seconds apart from one to the other, i caught something moving in my view and pointed to it saying "there's another one".  but once i focused on it, it was not a shooting star.  it was a dark gray blimp or eye shaped object moving pretty fast across the sky.  way too fast to be a blimp or an air plane.  this object had no lights what so ever and made no sound. it was barely noticeable as it were dark gray but having 20/10 vision i picked it up with ease.  i followed it across the sky with my finger from left to right, (north to south) in my field of view and then it was gone.

if you were to extend your arm while holding a quarter dollar against the sky, that would be about the size of the object i saw.  the whole event lasted about 15 seconds across the sky. i have seen hundreds of satellites before and they are small and bright and easy to explain.  this however was not easy to explain. i live north of the busiest airport in the world and close to dobbins air force base and can tell you exactly what kind of plane is flying above my head.  i know and love my airplanes.  i know the holding patterns they fly in and everything.  

whatever i saw it was very strange. i have never seen anything like it before or since.  if it were not for the blocked out moon i probably would have not seen it.  i wonder how many other ufo's are reported during lunar or solar eclipses?

i will never forget it. i can replay the even in my mind as if it were yesterday.
content.summary: Saw a gray blimp shaped object move accross the night sky but too fast to be a blimp and without sound or lights.

content.detailedDescription: So i was looking up at the sky hoping to see some stars, when all of a sudden i saw this strange flash in a triangular form. the light went from east to west and it only took about a minute before it was out of my sight. i knew it wasn't a plane cause a plane doesn't have 3 lights that are in a shape of a triangle. but i tried looking for it again, but it just disappeared for the night.
content.summary: Flashing light.

content.detailedDescription:
When i first saw this object, i suppose it was about 9:00 pm. i had just finished taking a short walk down the street. and was walking up the steps to my house when the object caught my eye.   

i saw what appeared to be a particularly bright object brighter than the brightest stars cross the sky. it went from the south east to the north west (not exactly sure of the exact orientation, but this is approximate). it slowed down and stopped. another object which was relatively smaller passed the object after it stopped in the sky. the smaller object continued past and started to turn redder and fainter. 

i went back inside my house and grabbed my telescope and told my brother and step brother what had happened. we stayed outside and waited to see if the object would move, but it didn't. it seemed like after it was done moving, it turned into what looked like an ordinary star. the object that stopped in the sky was still there, but since my tripod for my telescope was very short, i wasn't able to get a good view of what was in the sky. however, i laid on the ground and i was able to get a stable view. when i looked up in the sky, i saw a few things moving and my brother seemed to point out that the object that stopped in the sky was moving as well, but only slightly.

the large object moved smoothly, but did not follow a straight path. i watched it curve a bit. although a few of the trees in my yard somewhat blocked it, i was able to view it almost the entire time and it was only blocked by the trees for a few seconds. i watched it stop in clear, non-tree-covered sky. it didn't make any noise at all. 

i was a bit astonished when i saw it. after seeing the object, i watched it for about two hours and then i went inside because i was getting bit by mosquitoes. i believe it might still be in the same spot continuing to hover there. 

i have been watching the skies this evening and i have seen some other things that were a bit out of the ordinary, but that could be because i was hyped up about yesterday.
content.summary: Bright oval shaped object flew across sky and stopped in mid air still hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I got off of work at 9:30 drove southbound on i-75 heading towards 14 mile exit in troy.  upon approaching adams or crooks rd ( i cant remember because i was in aw) i looked south east over the horizon of the freeway and noticed 2 sets of 3 orangish bright lights. they were to large to be stars i thought maybe it was some aircraft with lights on it. then to the left was another set and then another. the third set i couldnt tell if it was a set of 3 because trees were now in the way and lost sight for about 30 seconds. i called my brother who left the same work place around the same time but he didnt pick up. i called my wife and told her to go outside and look up in the sky and see if she could see anything. i came around the trees still going south and now the lights were in a straight line. i called up a coworker of mine and told him what i was seeing and i was describing how i was seeing a line of orbs or spheres (8 plus).  and they were dissapearing from the left and right sides in sets until there were only 2 left. and then 1 of the 2 dissapeared and 1 remained. i was trying to locate a spot on the freeway to pull over by big beaver road and then the last one was dimming out. i could no longer spot it and called my brother and he picked up. i described what i was seeing and said that i was coming off an exit to observe the sky and hung up the phone. during that discussion with my brother, he was telling me how it might be some air show. i assured him it was not.  i was now approaching the 14 mile exit and my brother calls me back and tells me he sees one of the obecjts i was talking about. he said that it was to the left of him but very low. umbrella like bright orange the size of his entire thumb. i told him are you sure your seeing the same thing because i saw them way smaller. at that moment he said it shot straight up into the sky so fast and dissapeared. he said there were helecopters in that area.  i was so freaked out by the incident i went to a friends house who lives in warren. mi a couple of miles from the 14 mile exit.  my friend was out in his front yard watering his plants and i asked him how long was he out here for he said i just came to the front of the house 5-10 minutes ago but he was in the back yard for a while. i kept looking up in the sky and told him i cant believe what i just saw.  before i said anything else, he said his son was screaming for him to come to the front of the house to see 2 comets in the sky. by the time he arrived they were gone.  i then told him everything and to this moment i am in shock. i never believed i would see something like this. i am positive it was not flares or airplanes. it was too big and slow moving to be and airplane.  i am ebarassed to call the police or local news. i came on the net hoping to see some news about it but didnt see any. i know there has to be at least a hundred or more people who saw it. you couldnt miss it from your vision on the freeway. it seemed like it was over macomb county or maybe even over the river. i google searched your site and hope  you can make some use of this report.
content.summary: Triangular formation of 9 plus bright objects breaking formation and then dissapearing by sets.

content.detailedDescription: Son and i watch it bounce thought it was a firefly then we saw it was above the tree line went out mile or 2 bouce back the went south look like it went down the seacoast
content.summary: Bounced all over.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in yard watching litghing storm went to walk back towards the porch were my father and younger sister were. i dont kno why but i turned around away from porch and noticed a light which at first thought was a airplane but quickly realized it was not. i am a trained storm spotter and never have seen anything like this. was about 25 to 30 degrees from ground level coming from the se traveling nw. it was a quater or more in size at arm length, yellowish center with a glowing red aura. it traveled around the edge of the storm. watched it as it banked right and could tell it was an object just not the shape. the light did not bounce or penetrate through clouds. after it had went from sight i had chils and chil bumps.. cold.. need less to say its 85 and humid. also the lighting seemed to have diminished significantly.
content.summary: Yellow like a lit candle with red glowing aura.

content.detailedDescription:
Today , on the eve of the summer solstice i got visible signs/answer to my prayer/meditation. (btw, there is an ancient belief that on this day within the 24 hr time frame , the heaven & earth are bridged together). i went outside, sat down & asked a specific question , asking for a sign if indeed the ets we see are indeed benevelent , yes even me does have doubts at times. i must point out 1st , that the weather was absolutely fantastic without any rain what so ever . at few seconds of intensely formulating this question in my mind , turned my head towards the es direction & my mouth 'dropped' in a gasp of amazement . there was in that spot i was looking at was forming a rainbow ! not only that , but a visible light white huge sphere-like above this rainbow as well !  (a mother shop perhaps ?!) i begun taking photos , smiling & thanking g-d for this manifestation.  there also were cloud faces forming , could it be the lord's ?!                 in total i took 11 photographs , from 7:08:35 pm to 7:17:37 pm . only the last 2 photos didn't register anything unusual , but few jets flying . needless to say i was standing there in amazement :-)  after coming inside & loading those photographs on the computer , i noticed more unusual things that the camera captured . 
too bad , we can only upload 3 attachments with the report . however if mufon wishes i can provide these via e-mail . 
as usual , i felt elated & happy at the sighting & afterwards . 
the whole appearance formed itself in the lower part of the horizon level where i was at , at approx. mid point of es direction & above the lake . the visible half moon was very high in the sky (like 3-4 times higher ) & way to the right as in the south direction , & exactly above the 14 floor apt. building .
content.summary: Visible signs in the sky, 3 photos attached.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a smoke outside when viewing the planet mars.  just as i looked at the red planet an star like object appeared firstly as a dimly lit object in which the light grew in intensity and then faded out just as quickly.  the object was visible for only 2 to 3 seconds and moving fairly slowly.  it was traveling southwest to a northeasterly direction.  no photos or videos of the object were taken.
content.summary: Objects light grew in intensity then faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking at stars tonight, noticed one that moved back and forth, and in small circle.  did this for about ten minutes...So i am reporting it.  

last night, while star-gazing, my husband and i noticed in the sky an object moving like a boomerang, back and forth, and made 90 degree turn and went directly south and disappeared.
content.summary: Blinking starlike object moving in circular and back/forth pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work while i was riding on the midway orange line. over by the 35\archer orange line station,(near the stevenson expwy. i happened to look out the window, facing the southwest horizion.
all of a sudden, i've seen a silvery disk shape object not too far off from a distance, hovering low over the horizion, dazzling like it was doing a dance, then slowly moved away heading towards west. 

then there was this military jet air-craft following this disk shape object, not knowing both of where they went. it happen all within in a
3 minunte duration time

within about 30 secounds, i called (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)and told him what i had seen and explain it to him in details.

i'm not sure if this was an illusion or some kind of a reflection? 
or was it this the for real ufo sighting?
content.summary: Thought i seen a disc shape object by 35th and archer ave.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to take dog to do it's business. i looked down the alsea river towards ocean and i noticed a very,very bright light in the sky.It was not moving. i watched it for about 5 minutes i thought it might be a coast guard helicopter but it was'nt moving.I woke up my daughter to come outside.I told her put a coat because it was very cold that night. she saw the light also, she watched it for about 3 minutes, and holy **** it's a ufo. after she went inside i stayed outside about 2 more minutes, i went back inside to call my husband. that is when i realized it had moved because i could no longer see it from under my deck. we walked out to the middle of the drive way my husband and i watched it.While we were watching it i thought i saw it move towards the right but my husband said no it did not move. he went back inside and i stayed outside still watching it. the light was losing its brightness. it looked light it was fading.
content.summary: Cold, clear night west of waldport, oregon looked like over the bay.

content.detailedDescription: i was stopped at a traffic light near to an old railroad track and highway overpass. you have to look up while waiting for light to change while doing so object passed my line of sight. the object did not strike me as being an airplane or helicopter. the object appeared as silver disc with the bottom seeming flat. it motion was like when a plane passes you by while taking off or landing. for the few seconds object was visible i was struck with the thought what was that. the object passed behind a 2 story house which was few hundred feet from my location. it may have changed direction because further down the road you have a line of sight to the horizon.
content.summary: A silver shaped disc with a flat bottom passed overhead from behind my location.

content.detailedDescription: See video cigar shaped daytime sighting.  while standing in my driveway in saratoga county, nys i saw a white capsule/cylinder/cigar/tube with a darker band in the center on a slight diagonal...Flying or cruising across the sky.  it was absolutely silent, i ran to my truck where i keep my cameras loaded and ready to film because i am a long time skywatcher, i quickly zoomed in and captured this ufo.  when zoomed, the picture gets a little shaky and through the view finder i thought i saw something else in the frame, and you will see in the video, that this capsule/cylinder was being followed by a small unidentifiable small plane. i felt that this was the best capture yet of these commonly seen ufos that many other people are seeing from around the country as well as italy and russia.   the distance was less than a mile and at a 500' elevation. to see more captures of the same or similar object....See [cms/tg/pid].  i have my theories based on my research, the question is what do you think?
content.summary: Video: silent white cylindrical cigar shaped ufo daytime followed by small plane.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in the park with the dogs.  luckly i had just got my camera back from the repair shop.  i first notice it, then called my wifes attention to it.  it seemed lower when i first saw it and i could see that it was a cigar shape silver in color and had a  short fin sticking out ouf the mid section of  the craft. i couldn't hear any noise.  by the time i got my camera out of my truck, it was a lot higher and futher away.
it was hard to keep it in the frame because the camera has no view finder only a small screen to view the image and i was just pointing it in hopes that i was getting something most of the time.  for some reason i looked like a white pill shaped object on the video?  i do not know if this was a plane or something else.  i almost did not submit it because of the dought in my mind.  is this a common image of a plane when videoed with a digital camera?  or is this something else?
content.summary: Silver cigar with fin.

content.detailedDescription: While travelling east down farm to market road ( fm 676 ) just after sunset, toward the city of mcallen i noticed a large.  the altitude of the object was aprox. 800 to 1,000 feet, i thought it was odd as it was sitting in the final-approach flyway for mcallen miller international airport and was not moving... the object was clearly visible and quickly directed my wife's attention to it and asked her what she thought it might be...After a few moments she replied she did not know and became somwhat ex greyish silver colored oval shaped object sitting motionless in the skycited.  my wife as well as myself are highly trained aerial observers and have lived and participated many years in aviation programs ...I pulled over to the side of the road and we both watched the object for about a minute. it quickly shot off at great speed to the southeast toward the mcallen airport just before a continental airliner approached for landing.  i quickly called a good friend who works at the airport and asked if there had been any pireps or other reports of a brightly colored object to the northwest of the airport...He later called and said there were none.  i later asked several other aviation friends if they had heard or seen anything strange in the late evening sky, northwest of the airport...They all replied no !!
content.summary: I witnessed, along with my wife, a motionless, medium colored silver object, approx 30 to 35 ft. in diameter, approx. 800 to 1,000 ft. altitude in a clear cloudless  sky.  after several minutes it shot to the so.East at great speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were taking a trip to costco in leesburg, virginia @ 5:30pm for some shopping.  we went to park and my wife happened to look into the sky and notice a strange looking "white ball" in the air.  after we parked my family and i got out of the car and gazed at the sky for about 10 minutes.  we started noticing dozens of white spheres floating in the sky popping out of nowhere.  some started moving from east to north and others moved from east to northwest...Within the flight pattern of dulles airport.  at first, we thought the objects were balloons but because of the size of the objects, we knew it was something else.  we wondered "what was going on?"  wondering whether or not they were drones...

at least two of the spheres transformed into double spheres.  one on top of the other.  some of the spheres had lights others twirled around.  it almost reminded me of gliders twirling in the sky.  all of the spheres were stationary for a few minutes and then started floating in different directions.  after a few minutes of floating, some disappeared.  (we didn't wait for all of the spheres to disappear before going into the store) 

we went into costco to shop for a while and after we left, we went to the starbucks across the street for some coffee.  we sat outside and noticed that there were 3 or 4 more spheres in the sky.  the time was around 6:15pm.  my wife noticed what appeared to be a fighter jet flying very fast across the sky from east to west but no sound.  we left to go home (about 10 miles from the costco and starbucks) and stayed outside hoping to see more of the spheres.  around 7:30pm we noticed one more double sphere, it floated in the sky for about 10 minutes and then disappeared.
content.summary: Over a dozen white spheres in the sky over leesburg, virginia.

content.detailedDescription: Friend setting on back porch noticed and called me to witness sighting. i drew attention from my neighbor and she witnessed the sighting. it was moving in a straight line and same elevation and at a constant speed, that of a normal jet liner. no sound noted by my friend or myself.
content.summary: Silver cigar shaped, no wings, no sound, flying about same height as passenger jet to the west north-west with evening sun reflecitng bright silver color.
